revised_title: Effects of Oil and Oil Dispersants on Marine Environments: A Review
tldr: This article discusses the biological effects of oil pollution in the sea, focusing on the types of oil, their behavior after spillage, and the methods used to treat oil spills. The author highlights the importance of understanding the physical and chemical properties of oil and the impact on marine environments and commercial fisheries. The article also reviews current research on oil pollution and identifies unresolved problems and potential future research directions.
